Commands.Ring Holy: 3-HIT BRV attack.  If there's more than 1 enemy, the BRV hits are randomly dispersed (AoE).  Grants 2 stacks of Soul Divider.  Soul Divider raises Max BRV based on the number of stacks and grants BRV Regen.
Commands.Ring Holy+: 3-HIT BRV attack and removes Soul Divider.
Commands.Ultima (IX): 9-HIT BRV+HP attack.  If there's more than 1 enemy, the BRV hits are randomly dispersed and HP damage is equally divided amongst the enemies.  Grants 2 stacks of Soul Divider.  Soul Divider raises Max BRV based on the number of stacks and grants BRV Regen.
Commands.Ultima (IX)+: Repeats the attack a second time and removes Soul Divider.  Break bonus is applied again if an enemy is broken during the second attack.
Commands.Ability Recovery Attack Up: Recovers 1 use of 「Ring Holy」 and 「Ultima (IX)」 (up to the initial values)  Slightly raises Attack for 4 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Force Symphony: 5-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.  Moderately increases BRV damage to a single target.  100% HP damage dealt to all targets.  Grants 4 stacks of Soul Divider.  Grants Dark Messenger for 5 turns.  Soul Divider is not dispelled after using Ring Holy+ and Ultima (IX)+ while Dark Messenger is active.
Commands.BRV Attack+: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Grants 2 stacks of Soul Divider.
Commands.HP Attack+: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants 2 stacks of Soul Divider.

Passives.Ring Holy Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Ring Holy.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Ultima (IX) Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Ultima (IX).
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Ring Holy Charge: Increases the max uses of Ring Holy by 1.
Passives.Ultima (IX) Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Ultima (IX).
Passives.Soul Conductor: Slightly raises Max BRV and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Buff Attack&Speed: Slightly raises Attack and Speed while buffed.
